WorkItem.Description:
Would be handy if the Advanced DataGridView was available as a Nuget Package, ideally on https://www.nuget.org, but failing that, as a download on codeplex.

Also be good if the SearchToolBar Control was included with the Advanced DataGridView as well a separate.
WorkItem.Summary: Make this available as a Nuget Package

Comments.Message: Thanks for that. Though, any chance you could sign it to be strong named?I need that for my [LinqPad driver](https://rapiddevbookcode.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=LLBL4linqpad&referringTitle=LINQPad). No biggie as I can use http://www.nuget.org/packages/Nivot.StrongNaming
